properties.name: _Utah Territory
properties.note:
Utah Territory (1850-09-09)

1850/09/09 -> 1861/02/27

The United States created Utah Territory from the territory ceded by Mexico in the Treaty of Guadalupe-Hidalgo (1848), from territory to be purchased from the state of Texas in December 1850, and from unorganized federal territory.

(U.S. Stat., vol. 9, ch. 49[1850]/pp. 446-452 and ch. 51[1850]/pp. 453-458; Van Zandt, 159)
